node.title: Oxford Community Schools Close After Threat Against Middle School Two Weeks After Shooting
node.alt: Oxford Community Schools will be closed Tuesday after a threat against a local middle school came across social media two weeks after four students were killed in a shooting at Oxford High School. Here, Oxford High School can be seen at dusk.
node.description: The district stated that it was closing "out of an abundance of caution."
node.content:
["Oxford Community Schools will be closed Tuesday after a threat came across social media two weeks following the shooting at Oxford High School that killed four students.", "The district received an image online that included \"a specific threat directed at our middle school,\" according to a message posted on the Oxford Community Schools district website.", "\"Out of an abundance of caution, we are cancelling school in all our buildings on Tuesday, Dec. 14,\" the message continued. \"We plan to do a full security check of all our buildings while our security experts and law enforcement conduct their investigation.\"", "\"Please talk to your students and remind them that all threats at Oxford Community Schools will be taken seriously, investigated by law enforcement, and will be prosecuted to the full extent of the law.\"", "Local law enforcement was immediately notified by district authorities, and the district stated that students will still be able to pick up their backpacks from Oxford High School as scheduled.", "This is a breaking news story and will be updated with additional information.", "", "
Oxford Community Schools will be closed Tuesday after a threat against a local middle school came across social media two weeks after four students were killed in a shooting at Oxford High School. Here, Oxford High School can be seen at dusk.
"]
